```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Data Import: CSVs

Let's import data using the `redr` package.

```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv")
litters_df = janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```


look at the data

```{r}
litters_df

head(litters_df)
tail(litters_df)
```


```{r, eval = false}
view(litters_df)
```


```{r}
skimr::skim(litters_df)
```




`read_csv` options...

```{r, eval = FALSE}
read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv", na = c("", "NA", 999, 88), skip = 2)
```
